item.title: Charlie Puth - We Don't Talk Anymore [DROELOE Remix] - Key of Am - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song We Don't Talk Anymore [DROELOE Remix] performed by Charlie Puth. Chords used in the song: Am, F, G.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Attention - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Attention performed by Charlie Puth. Chords used in the song: Bm, C, D, Em.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Done for Me - Key of Bm - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Done for Me performed by Charlie Puth. Chords used in the song: A♭dim7, Bm7, C♯m7, F♯7, Gmaj7.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Done for Me - Key of Am - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Done for Me performed by Charlie Puth. Chords used in the song: Am7, Bm7, E7, F, F♯dim7.

item.title: Charlie Puth - One Call Away - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song One Call Away performed by Charlie Puth. Chords used in the song: Am, C, F, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song One Call Away performed by Charlie Puth. Chords used in the song: Am, C, F, G.
